trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There was one other sighting in Reno on or around June 12th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a friends house, we were outside in the backyard drinking a beer and having a smoke when I looked up and noticed a light in the sky to the South , That at first, (At least to me) looked like the space station flying over......... I said out loud "Ooh sweet the space station is flying right over us!".... Everyone looked up and saw the same object... Then the object seemed to get a bit brighter..... The object stayed on the same heading for about 3 seconds. Then without slowing down it did a right angle 90 degree turn then sped off, out of sight(about 25 seconds) to the East.
Summary: Object appeared from south did 90 degree turn.then left to the east
